This image shows a movie poster
In order add movies to your collection click the search button in the upper right part of the appplication:
Depending on your device capabilities and configuration you may see the following image which will allow you to perform voice search:

After performing search you will get a list of movies related to what you have typed or said to search query. You can freely switch between movies and tvs to perform this operation.\n If you want to add particular movie or tv to your collection press and hold on one position. A popout will appear questoning if you want to save information on your device. In order to remove particular position from your device simply press and hold and a another popout window will appear to delete it.
